    • Method Detail

      • createDocType

        @Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doct/create")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> createDocType(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                         CreateDocTypeCommand command)
        Creates docType. Only system administrator should be able to access this method.
        Parameters:
        command - with doc type details
        Returns:
        response entity with status and message

      • getAllDocTypes

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doct/all")
public Map<String,Object> getAllDocTypes(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                        PagingData pagingData)
        Controller method that will return all document types.
        Parameters:
        pagingData - to set amount of items per page, search phrase, sorting order
        Returns:
        allDocumentTypes and paging info for table.

      • getAllDocTypesNoGroups

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @PostMapping(path="/api/doct/all/nogroups")
public Map<String,Object> getAllDocTypesNoGroups(@RequestBody
                                                                                                                                         PagingData pagingData)
        Controller method to get all document types without groups.
        Parameters:
        pagingData - to set amount of items per page, search phrase, sorting order
        Returns:
        allDocumentTypes and paging info for table.

      • getGroupsApproving

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/groups/approving")
public List<String> getGroupsApproving(String docTypeName)
        Controller method to get approving groups by user name provided in parameters.
        Parameters:
        docTypeName - document type name
        Returns:
        List of groups that approve doc type provided in parameters.

      • getGroupsCreating

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/groups/creating")
public List<String> getGroupsCreating(String docTypeName)
        Controller method to get creating groups by user name provided in parameters.
        Parameters:
        docTypeName - document type name
        Returns:
        List of groups that approve doc type provided in parameters.

      • findDocTypeByName

        @Secured(value={"ROLE_USER","ROLE_ADMIN"})
 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/{name}")
public DocTypeDetailsDTO findDocTypeByName(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                            String name)
        Controller method to find document type by provided name. Name has to be exact.
        Parameters:
        name - of document type
        Returns:
        DocType

      • deleteDocType

        @Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
 @DeleteMapping(path="/api/doct/delete/{name}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteDocType(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                  String name)
        Controller method to delete docType by provided name.

        Returns:
        ResponseEntity

 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/{name}/signs")
public String[] findGroupsSigningDocType(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                                                String name)

        Returns:
        List of groups that can sign specific doc type

 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/{name}/creates")
public String[] findGroupsCreatingDocType(@PathVariable(value="name")

      • docTypeExists

        @Secured(value="ROLE_ADMIN")
 @GetMapping(path="/api/doct/{name}/exists")
public boolean docTypeExists(@PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                       String name)
        Controller method to check if doc type with provided name exists
        Parameters:
        name - of document type
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise
